sourcesContent: import{jsx as e}from"react/jsx-runtime";import*as a from"react";import{i18n as i}from"./i18n.js";import{useRange as t,ELLIPSIS as r}from"./useRange.js";import{PaginationItem as o}from"./PaginationItem.js";const s=(s,n,p,m,l,c,g)=>{const u=e(o,{type:"previous",currentPage:s,onClick:c,isDisabled:s<=1,ariaLabel:i.PaginationItem.PreviousItem.ariaLabel},"previous"),b=e(o,{type:"next",currentPage:s,onClick:l,isDisabled:s>=n&&!p,ariaLabel:i.PaginationItem.NextItem.ariaLabel},"next"),P=t(s,n,m);return[u,...a.useMemo((()=>P.map(((a,i)=>a===r?e(o,{type:"ellipsis"},1===i?"start-ellipsis":"end-ellipsis"):e(o,{type:"page",page:a,currentPage:s,onClick:g,ariaLabel:`Go to page ${a}`},a)))),[P,s,g]),b]};export{s as usePaginationItems};
